Author: MoosieGoose
Text: I went to the doctor for the first time in nearly a decade, and they mentioned that I had AN on my history. I'm now afraid to get blood work done, because they might associate the numbers with that and cause a fuss.   I wouldn't lie to them. The medications might make things worse if your numbers are not in line, and that is something your medical team needs to discuss.

Author: ddmar
Text: Please don't lie to your doctors about this. They need to treat you based on your most accurate medical history. I know eating disorders warp your perception of yourself, but if you want to be able to continue HRT safely, you likely need to get help and try to recover. You deserve it, and your treatment will be more likely to be successful if you're healthy and eating properly
